Class StreamUtil

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.lang.StreamUtil
public final class StreamUtil extends Object
Utility class for Java streams.

  • Method Details

    • zip

      public static <A extends @Nullable Object, B extends @Nullable Object, C extends @Nullable Object> Stream<C> zip(Stream<A> a, Stream<B> b, BiFunction<? super A,? super B,? extends C> op)
      Zip two streams, creating a new stream consisting of items generated by applying the given BiFunction on items taken from the input streams.

      Consider two streams a = a1, a2, a3, ... and b = b1, b2, b3, .... The result of zipping is a new stream zip(a,b) = op(a1,b1), op(a2,b2), op(a3,b3) ....

      The stream ends when either a or b end.

      Type Parameters:
      A - first stream generic item type
      B - second stream generic item type
      C - result stream generic item type
      Parameters:
      a - first stream
      b - second stream
      op - the operation that generates new items for the output stream
      Returns:
      stream consisting of the pairs of items created from items of either stream

    • concat

      @SafeVarargs public static <T extends @Nullable Object> Stream<T> concat(Stream<T>... streams)
      Concat multiple streams. The resulting stream contains all elements from the first passed stream followed by the elements of the second passed stream, and so on.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the generic element type
      Parameters:
      streams - the streams to concat
      Returns:
      the stream creating by concatenating elements from the argument streams

    • merge

      @SafeVarargs public static <T extends @Nullable Object> Stream<T> merge(Comparator<? super T> comparator, Stream<T>... streams)
      Merge several sorted streams into a single sorted stream containing the elements from the streams passed as the argument.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the generic element type
      Parameters:
      comparator - the comparator that defines the sort order
      streams - the sorted streams to merge
      Returns:
      sorted stream containing the elements of the argument streams

    • merge

      @SafeVarargs public static <T extends @Nullable Comparable<T>> Stream<T> merge(Stream<T>... streams)
      Merge several sorted streams into a single sorted stream containing the elements from the streams passed as the argument. Natural sort order is used as implemented in the element class.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the generic element type
      Parameters:
      streams - the sorted streams to merge
      Returns:
      sorted stream containing the elements of the argument streams

    • stream

      public static <T extends @Nullable Object> Stream<T> stream(Iterator<T> iter)
      Create a stream from the elements obtained from an iterator.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the element type
      Parameters:
      iter - the iterator
      Returns:
      stream of elements

      Create a stream from the elements obtained from an iterable.
      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:
      iterable - the iterable
      Returns:
